Reviews.Title: Atrix/Avemia Vari-Focal Weatherproof Bullet Camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel Bender "Daniel Bender"
Reviews.Content: First the company http://atrixcctv.com/ and http://www.avemiausa.com/ are the same company. They use the name "ATRIX" to try and get people to believe that they are affiliated with Motorola, but their NOT. Second: when I ordered the camera they sent me a "DEMO MODEL" which had scuff marks, paint chips and fingerprints inside the sun-shield. Also, the focus wouldn't lock in. Then when I tried to get it replaced, they had the audacity to browbeat and interrogate me to PROVE I bought the camera from them. I had to take photographs, read off serial numbers and basically jump through hoops just to get a replacement.Now, I live in western Pennsylvania, where high humidity and rain is abundant. Even though the camera is under an roof eave, the new camera fogs up after a rain. Also the focus goes out on it about once a week.If I could give "0" stars I would. My personal suggestion is "DON'T BUY THIS CAMERA!!!" Spend your money elsewhere, because this manufacture and their cameras are JUNK!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Long Range Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Bone "Gizmo"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera so I could keep an eye on my entrance gate over 200 feet away. The 50mm zoom gave me a very sharp, crisp picture. The gate has a street light so the long range IR's are not needed. The low lux shows a excellent night picture. I'm very impressed with the construction of this camera. Well worth the money.

ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: 1/3" Sharp Color CCD; Signal System: NTSC; IR Distance: 200 feets; IR Lamps 6 Powerful Long Range LEDs
700 TV Lines; Effective Pixels: 768(H) x 494(V); Minimum Illumination 0 LUX (IR on)
Scanning Area: 2:1 Interlace; S/N Ratio: >48~52dB; Electronic Shutter: 1/60 ~ 1/100,000 sec; Video Output: BNC, 1.0Vp-p, 75ohms
Supply Voltage: DC 12V (Recommend 1Amp); Operating Temperature: 14°F to 122°F; White Balance/ AGC/ Backlight Compensation: Auto
Mounting Lens: 5-50mm Vari-Focal; Synchronous System: Internal; Gamma Corrections: 0.45; Water resistance: IP 65
ProductInfo.Name: Atrix Night Vision Vari-Focal Weatherproof Bullet Camera 700TVL w/ 5-50mm Lens Long Range, Sharp Color CCD, IR Indoor/Outdoor Security Surveillance CCTV
